name: Yuki No Ko
description:
A story of a snowball who woke up in a cave on Mt. Midori with no memories of who she is or how she got there. 

Help her find the secrets of the mountain to reveal her past on this platforming adventure!

Controls:

Shift or Left mouse button to dash!

Spacebar to jump (once you collected jump item)

Feel free to give any feedback.

Future Scope of the game:

This game will continue to be developed and enhanced.
